start.title: Vencord Support
start.description: Use the buttons below to get support for Vencord.

disclaimer.title: Vencord Support
disclaimer.description: Before you continue, please read <#1027235873990901780>, <#1024351821873037462>, AND <#1110392683618390016>, as they contain important information and probably the solution you are looking for.

buttons.label: I have read those channels, continue

support.title: Vencord Support
support.description: Please select the type of support you need.

buttons.label: I have a question about Vencord
I have tried all of this and still need help

help.title: Vencord Support > Help
help.description:
Now that you have gone through this support dialog, you NOW can ask your problem in <#1026515880080842772>.
**Do not ask your question until you have looked through all of the relevant options in this dialog.**

vencord.title: Vencord Support > Vencord
vencord.description: Please select the issue that best describes your problem.

buttons.label: Theme broke and I can't open settings

vencord_cloud.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > 401 Error
vencord_cloud.description: Delete Vencloud from your connections and try again

vencord_rtc.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > RTC Connecting
vencord_rtc.description: This isn't Vencord's problem, it's Discord's. Try restarting Discord and if that doesn't work, try restarting your computer.

vencord_theme.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > Theme
vencord_theme.description:
Open the dev tools with `CTRL + Shift + i` and click on the "console" tab at the top. Then paste and run (with enter) the following code.

It will
- disable custom css (you can turn it back on in Vencord Settings)
- copy your current theme links to your clipboard as a backup
- remove all themes

```js
(() => {
    Vencord.Settings.useQuickCss = false
    copy(Vencord.Settings.themeLinks.join("\n"))
    Vencord.Settings.themeLinks = []
    Vencord.Settings.enabledThemes = []
})()
```

vencord_devtools_crash.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > Devtools Crash
vencord_devtools_crash.description: This is caused by Discord, there is nothing we can do to fix it. A way around it is to open Devtools while Discord is still loading.

vencord_devtools_logout.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > Devtools Logout
vencord_devtools_logout.description: This "feature" is Discord trying to not reveal your token. To disable this, enable the "NoDevtoolsWarning" plugin in Vencord Settings.

vencord_devtools_keybind.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > Devtools Keybind
vencord_devtools_keybind.description: If the ctrl + shift + i keybind doesn't work, it's likely because a different program conflicts with the keybind. This is most commonly the AMD Radeon Software. If you have that, disable keybinds in it (see [this video](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1024286218801926184/1139669756031553639/7qTeLzLlcS.mp4))

vencord_not_installed.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > Not Installed
vencord_not_installed.description: Use the "Repair" button in the installer or reinstall Vencord.

vencord_update.title: Vencord Support > Vencord > Update
vencord_update.description: Whenever Discord updates, Vencord is removed. There is no way around this, just reinstall Vencord.

faq.title: Vencord Support > FAQ
faq.description: Please select the question that best describes your problem.

buttons.label: How do I use other Discord mod (BD, Replugged, etc.) plugins with Vencord
Will I get banned for using Vencord

faq_install.title: Vencord Support > FAQ > Install
faq_install.description:
We provide a convenient graphical installer you can use. Or you can just grab Vencord from the Chrome & Firefox webstores.
Visit our [download page](https://vencord.dev/install) to find out more!

faq_plugins.title: Vencord Support > FAQ > Plugins
faq_plugins.description:
You don't. Vencord does not support other Discord mod's plugins.
||If you are talking about plugins from <#1032200195582197831>, see the pins in that channel.||

faq_tos.title: Vencord Support > FAQ > TOS
faq_tos.description: Vencord is against Discord's TOS, but there aren't any cases of people being banned. Have some common sense and you won't get banned.

faq_cloud.title: Vencord Support > FAQ > Cloud
faq_cloud.description: You can use Vencloud to migrate your settings. Just go to Settings > Cloud and follow instructions from there.

faq_uninstall.title: Vencord Support > FAQ > Uninstall
faq_uninstall.description: Use the installer and press "Uninstall". For the web version, just remove the extension from your browser.

installer.title: Vencord Support > Installer
installer.description: Please select the issue that best describes your problem.

installer_wont_open.title: Vencord Support > Installer > Doesn't Open
installer_wont_open.description:
Try using the powershell installer by running this in your terminal: 
```ps1
iwr "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Vencord/Installer/main/install.ps1" -UseBasicParsing | iex
```
Then follow the prompts it asks you and it will install Vencord for you.

installer_error.title: Vencord Support > Installer > Error
installer_error.description: Please select the issue that best describes your problem.

buttons.label: Hold On! You have a broken Discord insall

installer_error_mac.title: Vencord Support > Installer > Error > MacOS
installer_error_mac.description: Right click the installer and press "Open".

installer_error_hold_on.title: Vencord Support > Installer > Error > Hold On!
installer_error_hold_on.description: Press "Take Me There!" and follow the instructions the error says to fix your Discord install.

installer_error_invalid_location.title: Vencord Support > Installer > Error > Invalid Location
installer_error_invalid_location.description: You have selected an invalid location for your Discord install. Please select the correct location.

installer_error_other.title: Vencord Support > Installer > Error > Other
installer_error_other.description: Most likely, the error tells you exactly how to solve it. Read the error and if you still can't figure it out, ask in <#1026515880080842772>
